description.en: An help to work in the forest or tree plantation with chainsaw and a preparation of firewood. - Have an information tooltip, about size, type of wood, number of branches, before cut. - A meter with automatic reset after a complete cut.
description.de: An help to work in the forest or tree plantation with chainsaw and a preparation of firewood. - Have an information tooltip, about size, type of wood, number of branches, before cut. - A meter with automatic reset after a complete cut.
description.es: An help to work in the forest or tree plantation with chainsaw and a preparation of firewood. - Have an information tooltip, about size, type of wood, number of branches, before cut. - A meter with automatic reset after a complete cut.
description.fr: An help to work in the forest or tree plantation with chainsaw and a preparation of firewood. - Have an information tooltip, about size, type of wood, number of branches, before cut. - A meter with automatic reset after a complete cut.
description.it: Un aiuto per il lavoro forestale con la motosega e per la preparazione della legna da ardere

text.name: input_FW_SELLFW
text.fr: fw: vente de bois de chauffage

text.name: FW_CIPP
text.fr: Copeaux de bois ajouté à silo

text.name: FW_REQMESSAGE
text.en: for this session the firewood have high value !
text.de: for this session the firewood have high value !
text.es: for this session the firewood have high value !
text.fr: for this session the firewood have high value !
text.it: per questa sessione la legna vale di più !

text.name: FW_CSHE
text.en: Chainsaw hovereated! wait... or you can break it
text.de: Chainsaw hovereated! wait... or you can break it
text.es: Chainsaw hovereated! wait... or you can break it
text.fr: Chainsaw hovereated! wait... or you can break it
text.it: Motosega surriscaldata! aspetta... o potresti romperla
